game.name: Mara
game.shortDescription: 당신은 도둑입니다! 딜러에게서 의뢰를 받았고 이제 고고학자들이 최근 발견한 고대 무덤에서 몇 가지 유물을 훔쳐야 합니다!
game.shortDescriptionEn: You’re a thief! You’ve received a job from a dealer, and now you must steal several artifacts from an ancient tomb recently discovered by archaeologists!

reviewHighlights.text: i like the game just having a bug where the box is there just i cant see the lock im back on the game n I cant go any further without this being fixed...
Played Deep Inside and really enjoyed it. Started playing Mara & stuck very early on with a graphics issue - one lock you need to open does not appear...
